topics.body:
I just found out something kind of depressing; bravely default was supposed to be a final fantasy game but the final fantasy franchise has been utter shit the last couple of years so that's why it's not a final fantasy game.

That's kind of sad when a franchise has gone to such shit that even people in your own company don't want to touch the franchise.

topics.body:
I'm starting to realize why people don't like League.

Cause someone's level was 1 I kept taking hits for them and I was called a scrub for taking so much damage.  If you're jumping in front of a enemy's attack so that you take the hit and so that they can pop their ultimate attack that's not being a scrub that's realizing that being on 10hp and no potions you're fucked anyway so take the fucking hit so that your teammate can kill them.
